promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic mythical lizard fire-type pokemon holding a orange and black staff. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Pyrodrakon, a a gigantic mythical lizard fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: Flare Blizzard. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lizard", "fire" or "Pyrodrakon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, lizard-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lava texture background
generatedDescription: A colossus of flames, Pyrodrakon thrives in molten arenas, controlling eruptions. Its Flare Blizzard can melt even the hardest rocks.
